articles.title: IIT Kharagpur develops COVID-19 predictive model, says disease likely to continue till September end - indiablooms
articles.description: Kharagpur/IBNS: According to the COVID-19 predictive model devised by IIT Kharagpur, West Bengal, new cases of the disease will continue until at least the end of September.
